pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: to tie up in a bundle (e.g. straw, hair, bills, letters)

lessons.japanese: 彼は人々を束縛から解放した。
lessons.english: He liberated the people from bondage.

lessons.japanese: 私は一つの会社に束縛されたくない。
lessons.english: I don't want to be tied to one company.

lessons.japanese: 私は一つの会社に束縛されたくない。
lessons.english: I don't want to be tied to one company.

lessons.japanese: 彼は人々を束縛から解放した。
lessons.english: He liberated the people from bondage.

lessons.japanese: 束縛されず、自由奔放に生きるのが好き。
lessons.english: I like to live a free life, unrestrained by things around me.

lessons.japanese: トムはメアリーを束縛してるんだ。
lessons.english: Tom keeps Mary on a short leash.

lessons.japanese: トムはメアリーを束縛してるんだ。
lessons.english: Tom keeps Mary on a short leash.

lessons.japanese: 束縛されず、自由奔放に生きるのが好き。
lessons.english: I like to live a free life, unrestrained by things around me.
